title: Choosing to Keep the Commandments
itunes:title: Choosing to Keep the Commandments
description: Our first reading for this weekend is taken from a book that we don’t consult that frequently in the course of the liturgical year—namely, the book of Sirach. It is presented as a series of sayings of Jeshua ben Sira, a wise Jewish elder. Our reading is taken from the fifteenth chapter of Sirach, and it has to do with the awful fact of our freedom.

itunes:author: Bishop Robert Barron
